body:
Did it work? Thanks! As Mastapha mentions, Grasshopper in Rhino WIP contains now GhPython as a native add-on. GhPython in the WIP has priority over other manually-installed add-ons, so it will be possible to have two different versions, one for Rhino 5 and one for the WIP and future versions. Giulio
--
Giulio Piacentino
for Robert McNeel & Associates
giulio@mcneel.com
